oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Akin, Walter, 1917 April 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Walter Akin, dated August 16th, 1911. Illustrates the first page of the document. Akin’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on April 27th, 1917. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Akin family
